text: Thomas Edwin "Tom" Jarriel (December 29, 1934 - October 24, 2024) was an American television news reporter. He worked for the ABC network from 1964 to 2002. Jarriel was born in LaGrange, Georgia. Jariel died on October 24, 2024 from problems caused by a stroke in Annapolis, Maryland at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American television news anchors Category:Journalists from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Tom Jarriel
